ingredients.item: 4 tbsp Clearspring brown rice miso paste

instructions.step: Cook the eggs in small pan of boiling water for 6 minutes, then remove and cool in cold water. Meanwhile, place the miso, stock, garlic and soy sauce in a large saucepan and bring to a simmer. Add the noodles to the miso stock and cook for 2 minutes.

Stir in the pak choi, runner beans and mushrooms and cook for a further 2–3 minutes until tender. Peel and halve the eggs. Divide the noodle soup between 4 large bowls and top with the eggs and salad onions. SF
